text: munde avaru tam'ma avadhiya koneyannu muṭṭidāga avarannu niyamānusāra (patniyarāgi) iṭṭukoḷḷiri athavā niyamānusāra avarannu pratyēkisiri hāgū nim'ma paiki ibbaru n'yāyavantarannu sākṣiyāgisikoḷḷiri. Mattu nīvu, allāhanigāgi sākṣi hēḷiri. Ivu, allāhanalli mattu paralōkadalli nambike uḷḷavanige nīḍalāguttiruva upadēśagaḷu. Allāhana bhaya uḷḷavanige avanu (allāhanu, saṅkaṭagaḷinda) hora baruva dāri tōruvanu
